paragraph: To call or text the contact number for a consultation

detailsData.title: Former Insurance Company Insider
detailsData.content: Attorney Bryan A. Mason has insider experience in the insurance industry, providing unique knowledge to help clients.

detailsData.title: Maximum Compensation
detailsData.content: Crafting personalized strategies for each case to ensure clients receive full remuneration.

detailsData.title: You Don’t Pay Until We Win
detailsData.content: No fees charged unless compensation is obtained, offering risk-free legal representation.

address: 4100 Latham Street, Suite H, Riverside, CA 92501
subHeading: Experienced Inland Empire Personal Injury Law Firm
valueProp: Gavel Law Firm is a highly-rated personal injury law firm based in Riverside, California, committed to helping Californians get compensated for their injuries.

testimonalData.text: Gavel Law Firm did an amazing job with my injury case. The team was professional, efficient, and exceeded my expectations.
testimonalData.author: P.M.

testimonalData.text: Brian was incredibly helpful, he made our experience with an attorney the best one we have ever had.
testimonalData.author: N.M.

testimonalData.text: Bryan's responsiveness is truly remarkable. He promptly addresses any concerns or questions, ensuring that we always felt supported and informed throughout the entire process.
testimonalData.author: Ruben A.
